title: HDFC Bank
description:
Features of HDFC loan

No collateral or security required to avail a loan.

Loan disbursal within a day of applying for the loan.

HDFC loan interest rates range from 10.50% p.a. to 21.00% p.a.

Borrowers can opt for the ‘Sarv Suraksha Pro’ policy, which provides a credit shield cover, an accidental hospitalisation cover, and a permanent disability/accidental death cover.

Borrowers can also avail an optional insurance cover that will offer coverage against personal accidents and critical illnesses.

title: SBI Loan
description:
Features and Benefits of SBI Pensioner Loan

The processing fee is nominal. Defence pensioners need not pay any processing fee.

Fast loan processing.

The loan is devoid of interest costs.

If you add credit into your loan account which will reduce the loan burden and interest.

For central government employees the minimum loan amount is Rs.25,000. The maximum is pension of 18 months with a different upper cap for different ages.

For defence employees the minimum loan amount is Rs.25,000. The maximum is 36 months’ Pension with a ceiling of RS 14.00 lac for Pensioners below 56 years. It is also pension of 18 months with a different upper cap for different ages.

title: PNB Loan
description:
Punjab National Bank offers personal loans up to Rs.20 lakh under the ‘loan Scheme for Public’ scheme at interest rates starting from just 8.90% p.a. The repayment tenure extends up to 72 months, and the processing fees levied is up to 1% of the loan amount.

The bank also offers loans of up to Rs.20 lakh under the ‘PNB Doctor’s Delight – loan Scheme to Doctor’ scheme for a maximum tenure of up to 84 months.

This lender offers personal loans to help you meet your immediate financial expenses. Whether you need to consolidate your debt, pay for your child’s wedding, take off on an exotic vacation, or anything of the sort, personal loans from Punjab National Bank can be availed at attractive rates to help you fulfill your dreams.

title: Mahindra Finance Loan
description:
The personal loans from Mahindra Finance come with competitive rates of interest. Only Employees of the Mahindra Group and existing customers of Mahindra Finance are eligible to apply for these loans. These instant loans can be disbursed in as less as 2 days and feature easy documentation and flexible repayment options.

Loan amount – Up to Rs.3 lakhApproval and disbursal of loan within 2 daysRepayment period – Up to 3 years
